summary: The trials and tribulations of a French couple's efforts to adopt an orphan baby in Cambodia.
cast: Jacques Gamblin|Isabelle Carré|Bruno Putzulu|Lara Guirao|Frédéric Pierrot|Maria Pitarresi|Jean-Yves Roan|Séverine Caneele|Gilles Gaston-Dreyfus|Anne Loiret|Philippe Saïd|Vongsa Chea|Pridi Phath|Neary Kol|Rithy Panh|Narith Ponn|Srey Pich Krang|Anne-Marie Philipe|Daniel Langlet|Corinne Thézier|Vann Touch|Duc Dung|Sothea Tran|Philippe Vieux|Nathalie Bécue|Melody Touch|Mariecke de Bussac|Sophoan Som|Laurence Lasheb|Chanra Pha|Sauphear Tep|Robert Sam|Savuth Tan|Somany Na|Théo Royer|Sokunthol Pa|Marie Leclercq|Claire Vidoni|Ky Eng Lim|Reaksmey Nhem|Sokhen Chour|José Pinault|Kuy Chanthra Soeur|Sina Ouch|Patrick Courteix|Jean-Marc Khao|Torn Chorn|Vanthon Duong|Sethy Dy|Lauren-Soriya Ky|Borivan Phav|Maynching Ung
title: La pequeña Lola
